name: Hilda Valentine Goneril (Fire Emblem) LoRA
description:
Hilda Valentine Goneril (Fire Emblem Three Houses) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

My favourite girl/romance from Fire Emblem Three Houses. I still remember how upset I was because "something" happens if you pick a specific route. I had to use a cheatcode to get her back into the team and keep her. Anyway, this LoRA, like my recent Tifa LoRA, can do all her outfits, with proper prompting of course, weight should be arounf 0.7 for more accuracy. Trigger is hilda valentine goneril plus descriptive words and outfit names for the summer and winter ones (e.g.: hilda valentine goneril \(summer\) ). Check the examples to see how I got all. Keep in mind, however, that her summer outfit had like 4 examples, so it's pretty hard to get (the prompt gets it 90% right, then I helped it with some inpainting for the right colors on the frills). The post-timeskip outdit is the easiest to get perfectly. Models used are AOM2, AnyLoRA and AnyPastel.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
